description: Today we meet Aamon, a 20-year old strapping Irish lad that has movie star looks and a thick uncut cock. Frankly, I'm in heaven just looking at this fine gentleman, and thrilled that Major Wood discovered him for me. . .  er, I mean, you . . . lol. (And is it just me, or does he look a little bit like the actor Simon Baker?)Aamon -- a traditional Irish name, as we find out in our interview with him -- stands 6' tall and weighs 190 lbs. He's from Colorado and is out visiting sunny Southern California. He loves to surf and back in school he played soccer, boxed and snowboarded a lot.He tells Major Wood about a sexual experience he had in Korea, where the local girl he was with kept saying he 'had a voice like Obama.' He couldn't really understand why -- and neither can we. We'll chalk this one up to being lost in translation. Aamon says that he wanted to try his hand at porn because he loves sexy and loves 'trying something new.' Well, if you're going to try something new, then taking off your clothes and jerking off in front of a camera is certainly a giant leap forward into new territory, now isn't it?Aamon works his uncut dick to a positively gushing load, shooting stream after stream across his stomach and chest. He's out of the breath and surprised by the volume of cum he's ejected. Major Wood asks if he'll come back again some time, and Aamon quickly answers 'Fuck yeah, definitely!'
title: Aamon
